title: Flight Simulator 2020 -  Addon spotlight - Van RV-7 - version 1.0
description:
A new airplane has been released for MSFS 2020: the Van RV-7. This two seater aircraft is still under development but I am really impressed already by the quality of the aircraft. Almost everything is working and besides some small bugs it is ready to go airborne. After reviewing the outside we continue with the inside and take the aircraft out for a short flight.

0:00 intro video
0:10 start of the external and internal review
01:52 starting the engine 
06:10 take off
08:27 testing the autopilot
14:27 landing

If you want to try the aircraft yourself please download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/23192/van-s-rv-7
